lines.text: You couldn't be mean. You're too pretty!
That's a fine trick. You know the prisoner's afraid of fire.
The judge also suggested that Dr. Segert might like to come along with the prisoner.
I'm a scientist, not a clergyman. I go by the evidence of things as they are, not as I might like them to be.
Oh, no, you're the expert. Turn on your lights.
Unfortunately for humanity, the light hasn't been invented...
